body.p: To perform the optional concentration test set out in paragraph B7B, Purchaser needs to determine the fair value of the gross assets acquired. Applying paragraph B7B, Purchaser determines that the fair value of the gross assets acquired is CU1,000, calculated as follows:

li.p: the fair value of the building (CU500); plus
the fair value of the identifiable intangible asset (CU400); plus
the sum (CU400) of the consideration transferred (CU200), plus the fair value of the non-controlling interest (CU120), plus the fair value of the previously held interest (CU80); over
the fair value of the net identifiable assets acquired (CU300 = CU500 + CU400 + CU100 – CU700).
